 Glenn Quinn

I don't know how many people here watch or used to watch Angel, but...

Glenn Quinn, the actor who played Doyle in the first season of Angel died last week, aged just 32.

I was just looking at the BBC's webpages last night and found this.

It's shocking when people so young die. Makes you think a lot about your own mortality.
